name: Peter and the Pesky Puppets (Agushmar)
description:
-Entry for Ludum Dare 50-    

Play on fullscreen!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Our game tells us the story of Peter, a 7-year-old boy who has a strong creativity and doesn't like to go to sleep. While his family is away and he is entrusted with keeping the order in his house, he tends to embark on adventures accompanied by his hat and surrounded by darkness.

      On this particular occasion we will accompany Peter in his task of collecting the evil spirits on the house! The most important thing at night is not letting your light go out,  no adventurer will be able to advance without being able to see where they are going, so in order to do so we will have to refill our oil lamp with the fuel bottles spread across the house. While he battles against time in order to keep his lamp on, Peter will have to search for the evil spirits, which are really not-so-evil-and-not-so-spirit-like, and capture them to keep them from causing any mischief. Peter will have to be smart and use logic to decipher the riddles left behind by the spirits and find them before his lamp runs out of fuel and he is engulfed by darkness. But even so there is no need to fear it... right?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W A S D - Move

I - Riddle list

E - Collect Puppets

TAB - Pause
